div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://fhir.cqdg.ca/CodeSystem/qc-ethnicity defines the following codes:

tr.td: Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
First Nations, Metis and Inuit people
Person who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the Americas
Premières Nations, Métis et Inuits du Canada
Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin America
Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asia
Asiatique de l'est et du sud-est
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asia
Individual descending from more than one ethnic group

description.value: Classification of people living in Quebec in a named category of humans sharing a common history, geographic origin or nationality. The ethnic codes used to represent these concepts are based on a list provided by the genomic sequencing center

definition.value: Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley

code.value: First Nations, Metis and Inuit people

display.value: First Nations, Metis and Inuit people

definition.value: Person who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the Americas

value.value: Premières Nations, Métis et Inuits du Canada

definition.value: Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin America
Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asia

value.value: Asiatique de l'est et du sud-est

definition.value: Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asia
Individual descending from more than one ethnic group
